name: Galaxy 3D Space Defender
description:
An alien invasion destroys your family, country, planet. Protect the earth in this exciting 3D action. Galaxy 3D Space Defender - Use the latest technical weapons and punish extraterrestrial monsters. Space shooting games.

PREPARE FOR INTERGALACTIC WAR b>

Beginners will enjoy a classic mode with several lives. Shooting games. Destroy meteorites and bypass other spacecraft.

If you are serious, fighter, then play hardcore mode, where you can not miss a single enemy on our planet. You will be saved only by your agility, there is no place for weaklings and crybaby. Save you planet wich sky force for space. Defeat earth from space air attack.

Do not forget about the boss-mode: fight only with the largest and most powerful alien monsters. They will not give you one free second. Prepare and reflect the greatest alien space attack!

IMPROVE ARMY AND SHIPS b>

At your disposal are more than 30 high-tech spacecraft. Galaxy 3D. Get your skills and protection. Each new space ship will increase your chance to save the land from the invasion. Arcade space ship shoot em up game.

YOU ARE THE LAST HOPE OF THE EARTH b>

All the inhabitants of the world believe that you can save the planet. 3D Space Defender and air attack. Shooting games as sky force. Plunge into the galactic 3D adventure and save your family. Shoot em up and defend the earth.


FEATURES: b>
֍ 3D graphics
֍ Arcade Mode
֍ Large speeds
֍ Pump skill and armor
